import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn } from 'mdbreact'; import DocsLink from './../components/docsLink'; import SectionContainer from './../components/sectionContainer'; class thirdForm extends Component { state = { knowAboutUT:'', }; submitHandler = event => { event.preventDefault(); event.target.className += ' was-validated'; }; changeHandler = event => { this.setState({ ...this.state, [event.target.name]: event.target.value}); }; render() { return (
Select any radio button
Submit Form
); } } export default thirdForm;
